system.description:
Prerequisites

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.WZgKEHaJW8emVPBl]{Personal Firearms Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.MewnfIzMN5NPg8o4]{Explosive Weapons Proficiency}, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.RWi2AyX6xFIbQZJt]{Explosive Weapons Specialist}

Benefits

When firing a grenade launcher, rocket launcher, or mortar, the combat Point cost is 1 less. Reloading a grenade launcher or rocket launcher with a filled box magazine costs 2 Combat Points. Reloading a grenade launcher or rocket launcher that uses linked ammunition with a new link costs 3 Combat Points. Reloading a grenade launcher or rocket launcher from loose rounds, or refilling a box magazine costs 1 Combat Points per round loaded.
system.summary: -1 CP, 2 CP to reload magazines, 1 CP for loose rounds, 3 for belts.
